## MapView.addDataSource() method

Adds a new \[\[DataSource\]\] to this `MapView`<!-- -->. `MapView` needs at least one \[\[DataSource\]\] to display something.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addDataSource(dataSource: DataSource): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataSource | [DataSource](./harp-mapview.datasource.md) | The data source. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
